ygData.subject: Skills
ygData.msgSnippet: Scoped out the website posted by Jantis Eorl and it was great!  I know there is a formula to gaining skills per level, but is it harder to start and advance in
ygData.messageBody: Scoped out the website posted by Jantis Eorl and it was great! I know there is a formula to gaining skills per level, but is it harder to start and advance in a skill when you start later in levels or does it matter when you start a skill at all? For instance I have a character who just picked up skills (kicking, hand to hand, and swimming) and I can't seem to hit the same levels I do with my other skills (offense, defense, 1h slashing). And do I ever practice!
